;With the introduction of the butterfly armstroke , breaststroke races grew to become some of the most exciting occasions in aggressive swimming . Some competition continued to swim the breaststroke underwater , as was the personalized throughout individuals years. Others swam the ‘new’ butterfly-breaststroke on the floor. Even now others swam a blend of the two styles . Quickly enoough, breaststroke races were all becoming won by butterfly-breaststroke swimmers.
